title: Pro-Gun Democrat Ignores Bombardment Of Gun Violence Questions In Facebook Q&A
text: Sen. Heidi Heitkamp , a pro-gun Democrat from North Dakota , fielded questions about education on her Facebook page Wednesday, but ignored queries asking how she'll combat shootings in schools. Heitkamp, who holds an A rating from the
